messages.message: Generate random test data with translations for development and testing
messages.translation: Generate random test data with translations for development and testing

messages.message: This module is intended for development and testing purposes only. Do not use in production environments.
messages.translation: This module is intended for development and testing purposes only. Do not use in production environments.

messages.message: Generate or delete test data. Each action will affect all content types.
messages.translation: Generate or delete test data. Each action will affect all content types.

messages.message: Creates random content with translations for all active languages
messages.translation: Creates random content with translations for all active languages

messages.message: 5-20 published pages with tags, categories, and images
messages.translation: 5-20 published pages with tags, categories, and images

messages.message: 5-20 menu items in Main Menu (nested, pointing to pages)
messages.translation: 5-20 menu items in Main Menu (nested, pointing to pages)

messages.message: Removes all content created by this module
messages.translation: Removes all content created by this module

messages.message: Deletes all tracked tags and their translations
messages.translation: Deletes all tracked tags and their translations

messages.message: Deletes all tracked categories and their translations
messages.translation: Deletes all tracked categories and their translations

messages.message: Deletes all tracked pages and their translations
messages.translation: Deletes all tracked pages and their translations

messages.message: Deletes all tracked menu items from Main Menu
messages.translation: Deletes all tracked menu items from Main Menu

messages.message: Are you sure you want to delete all generated test data? This action cannot be undone.
messages.translation: Are you sure you want to delete all generated test data? This action cannot be undone.

messages.translation: No active languages found. Please add at least one language.

messages.translation: Successfully generated: %d tags, %d categories, %d images, %d pages, %d menu items (with translations for %d languages)
